## Repository Information

**Repository:** travisvn/awesome-claude-skills
**URL:** https://github.com/travisvn/awesome-claude-skills
**Category/Focus:** Claude Skills directory - widely-starred, comprehensive Claude Skills collection

## Submission Details

### Target Audience
Claude users (Code, Desktop, claude.ai) seeking production-ready skills for their workflows. This is one of the most popular Claude Skills directories, providing excellent visibility to the Claude ecosystem.

### Positioning/Pitch
PM-Skills is a comprehensive collection of 24 production-ready Product Management skills for Claude, covering the complete product lifecycle from discovery through iteration. Unlike single-purpose skills, this is a complete PM workflow framework following the Triple Diamond methodology.

### Relevant Section
Should be added to a "Product Management" or "Productivity & Workflows" section. If no such section exists, could fit in "Professional Skills" or "Business & Strategy" category.

### Submission Content

**Title/Name:**
```
PM-Skills
```

**Description:**
```markdown
24 battle-tested PM skills covering the complete product lifecycle (Triple Diamond framework). Generate PRDs, user stories, hypotheses, experiments, retrospectives, and more with professional templates and examples. Includes workflow bundles for Feature Kickoff, Lean Startup, and full product development cycles.
```

**Link:**
```
https://github.com/product-on-purpose/pm-skills
```

**Additional metadata (if applicable):**
- **Skills Count:** 24
- **Workflow Bundles:** 3 (Feature Kickoff, Lean Startup, Triple Diamond)
- **Phases:** 6 (Discover, Define, Develop, Deliver, Measure, Iterate)
- **License:** Apache 2.0
- **Slash Commands:** âœ… All 24 skills

## Notes

This is a high-priority submission - travisvn/awesome-claude-skills is one of the most visible Claude Skills directories. Should emphasize:
1. Complete skill collection (not just one or two skills)
2. Professional PM frameworks and templates
3. Production-ready with real examples
4. Agent Skills Spec compliant
5. Works across Claude platforms (Code, Desktop, claude.ai)
